analysis.description:
Crowdsale._forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/8/0x6eacb6f95b8119aa92d2d394f0a04ad83fe42091.sol#411-413) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- wallet.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x6eacb6f95b8119aa92d2d394f0a04ad83fe42091.sol#412)
